doc: A Resource represents a blob with a name and a resource accessor URI.

1.doc: Name must not be a path, just the human readable (and not unique) file name.
1.name: Name

2.doc: URI is likely an unreadable link to resolve the actual data. It may incorporate additional security tokens and may have a limited lifetime and its scheme is undefined.
2.name: URI

3.doc: MimeType is optional and is a hint about the anticipated content.
3.name: MimeType
